report.title: Report
report.text:
If you believe there's been a violation of Clubrare's Terms of Service or Community Guidelines, please complete this report.
For all cases related to potential copyright infringement, please email support@clubrare.xyz directly with a formal DMCA Takedown Request.

summary.coverText: We recommend you upload an image of 1280 x 280 resolution. Max file 20MB
summary.reccomandImage: We recommend an image of at least 400*400.

upvote.giveUpvote: Give this profile an upvote so they can receive early access to Foundation’s creator tools.

communityUpvote.text1: With the community Upvote, artists are encouraged to support other artists and to set the stage for a modet of community-led curation that puts power in the hands of creator
communityUpvote.text2: In the new creative economy, we all rise up together

verifyProfileViaTwitter.text1: Post a public tweet that contains your wallet adsress (0xyfhhvje836e45tdbcmwiruhfnbvmvj)
verifyProfileViaTwitter.text2: Paste the URL of the tweet to verify your profile

text.part1: Congratulations, you claimed your NFT successfully. Its
text.part2: currently being transferred to your wallet

footer.footerText: ClubRare - The premiere NFT marketplace for physical collectibles, connecting the metaverse the real world.

firstHeading.buildText1: The ClubRare mission is to build a collector-centered marketplace for physical
firstHeading.buildText2: goods on web3, become the bridge from the metaverse to the real world, and
firstHeading.buildText3: empower individuals to shape their destinies both on and offline.

about.middleText1: ClubRare is developing the future of commerce and physical distribution, centered on the collectors. Native to web3, ClubRare is empowering the individual by connecting them directly to creators, connecting creators directly to the metaverse, and connecting the metaverse to the physical world.
about.middleText2: At ClubRare, collectors can communicate directly with each other and the creators they support. With innovative governance protocols, community members shape the evolution of the ecosystem, earn unique physical and digital rewards, and build their presence in the metaverse.

endHeading.text1: More than physical. More than digital. ClubRare is the

endTitile.text1: ClubRare will never have private token sales. The development team and community all receive a transparent and fair distribution of tokens according to their contributions and support. The long-term goal is full decentralization.
endTitile.text2: ClubRare is committed to sharing both profit and governance with the community. The community determines ClubRare’s operating policies, steers the development of ClubRare products, and gets rewarded for their participation.
endTitile.text3: ClubRare is committed to never using unsustainable rewards or gimmicks to capture market share. Contrary to other projects that offer huge promises but fail to deliver over time, ClubRare is building long-term economies within the ecosystem.

EMPOWERING.EMPOWERING1: The future of the distribution economy is EMPOWERING,

careers.text1: Join us as we innovate commerce in web3
careers.text2: The ClubRare mission is to build a collector-centered marketplace for physical goods on web3, become the bridge from the metaverse to the real world, and empower individuals to shape their destinies both on               and offline.
careers.text3: At ClubRare, we are building platforms that empower individuals to express themselves. We’re bridging the real world to the digital with a revolutionary logistics system for NFT-backed physical goods.

text.text1: Trade real-world collectibles and earn huge rewards

homeClub.text2: List your NFTs and claim your free $MPWR tokens - the currency of the metaverse
homeClub.text3: Earn 180% reward with LP NFT staking

reward-stack.heading: Rewards to Collect
reward-stack.text: Earn one third of our market fee by staking $MPWR
reward-stack.Phygital-Item: Earn $MPWR by listing your Phygital Item
reward-stack.Earn-trading-rewards: Earn trading rewards when you buy or sell any NFT on ClubRare (private listings excluded). Rewards distributed once daily. Claim period not available between 10:00AM - 12:00PM EST

token-lunch.heading: ClubRare’s ILO has ended
token-lunch.text1: Thank you to our community who participated

token-buying.heading: Initial Liquidity Offer (ILO)
token-buying.participated: You have already participated in ILO!
token-buying.text: You will now participate in ClubRare Intial Liquidity Offering for 1ETH, Rewards will be distributed linearly for 360 Days. Please confirm to continue with this transaction.

transffer-assets.heading: You are not eligible for MPWR airdrop

select-nfts.heading: Select your NFTs
select-nfts.text2: Get started by selecting & approving any of your NFT collections

modal-footer.heading: Rate 1 ETH = 1 WETH
modal-footer.text: You will receive same amount WETH after the swap. No fee is charged and the only cost is transaction gas
